name: tennis-club-showcase
description: Automated screenshot and video showcase generator for Tennis Club RT2

scripts.help:
echo 'Tennis Club RT2 Showcase Commands:
  npm test - Test system requirements
  npm run generate-all - Create complete showcase
  npm run capture - Screenshots only
  npm run showcase - Interactive web showcase only
  npm run video - Video only
  npm run serve - View showcase locally
  npm run clean - Remove generated files'
